sentences: In the sub-group on REDD-plus, parties met in an informal drafting group to consider text from Annex III.C of document FCCC/AWGLCA/2009/14 .
Initial consultations on REDD-plus addressed scope and objectives.
Parties discussed whether the scope should include percentage goals and whether specific activities that comprise REDD-plus should be listed.
Parties then considered text on safeguards and began discussing reference levels.
Consultations continued on MRV and finance.
